title: The War On Christmas With Death Tolls In The Billions: Randomini's Grand Decemberween Advent Talkstravaganza v2017
content: [[>]] [[module Rate]] [[/>]] [[div class="content-panel standalone series" style="background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/advent-calendar-2015/christmaspattern2.png);"]] [[=]] + TODAY'S READING **DEC 10: [[[Decompression]]] by Zyn** + BANDCAMP PLAYLIST [[html]] [[/html]] + LINKS TO PAGES **DEC 01: [[[who-am-i|Who Am I?]]] by MayD** **DEC 02: [[[SCP-173-D]]] by mlister** **DEC 03: [[[Hartliss Detective Agency]]] by The Great Hippo** **DEC 04: [[[Budget Cuts]]] by Hercules Rockefeller** **DEC 05: [[[Let The Right One Innily]]] by trennerdios** **NOV 06: Readings were postponed due to today being November.** **DEC 07: [[[A Reason To Die]]] by Shaggydredlocks** **DEC 08: [[[Santa's New Home]]] by MrWrong** **DEC 09: [[[when-it-s-too-late-to-go-back|The only way left to go is forward]]] by Agent MacLeod** [[/=]] [[/div]] It was two years ago that I did [[[advent-calendar-2015|Randomini Continues Talking Despite The Best Efforts Of Almost Everyone He Knows: Advent Calendar Edition v2015]]]. This year I am doing it again, because my mouth is good, and my words are great, and I like to talk. So I am doing recordings for a bunch of people this year too. **SO.** Every day this month until Christmas, I'll do a reading of a tale [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-4390862/christmas-advent-calendar-readings-v2017 as nominated in this thread]. What will happen on Christmas??? It is a mystery.
author: Randomini
